title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - PhysicsX: Scaling Physics AI for Automotive Aerodynamics (STP109)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - PhysicsX：为汽车空气动力学扩展物理AI (STP109)
abstract: Physics AI models for automotive aerodynamics traditionally struggle with real-world applications due to limited training data diversity. PhysicsX addresses this challenge with their new Large Physics Model (LPM), powered by AWS's GPU-accelerated CFD simulations and active learning to generate diverse automotive geometry training data. Learn about how this foundation model significantly reduced fine-tuning requirements and has already been successfully deployed at major automotive manufacturers demonstrating how data diversity and scalable computing can drive practical engineering solutions.
abstract_cn: 汽车空气动力学物理AI模型传统上由于训练数据多样性有限而难以应用于实际场景。PhysicsX通过其新型大型物理模型(LPM)解决了这一挑战,该模型由AWS的GPU加速CFD模拟和主动学习提供支持,以生成多样化的汽车几何训练数据。了解这一基础模型如何显著减少微调需求,并已成功部署于主要汽车制造商,展示了数据多样性和可扩展计算如何推动实用工程解决方案。
